uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591

Class MalfunctionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591.MalfunctionHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Captain, Engineer, ServiceRobot, SpaceMonkey

    public abstract class MalfunctionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    MalfucntionHandler is an abstract class that all subclasses need to implement the abstract method handle problem and can use the protected methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addHandler(MalfunctionHandler next)
      addHandler is a final protected method that is responsible for the proccessing the handlers.
      Severity getSeverity()
      getSeverity is a getter method for the severity.
      protected void processMalfunction(Malfunction malfunction)
      processMalfucntion is a final protected method that can't be override by the subclasses, but can be used by them when specifying the handleProblem method in the subclasses.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
